title: @Riot Gradius Having a good day?
body:
Probably been a kinda busy kinda chill one since you got some time to post on eh?

http://i.imgur.com/bE41G7O.gifv

Have a seat, tell me about the thing you do at work at Rito that I can't remember cuz FEK is being weird about not displaying your job, don't mind the otter acting like a person eating food at said table.

https://i.giphy.com/media/krlCPTKzMbbzi/giphy.gif

We're all cool here, it's nice to get a load off once in a while.

Comfy? Having a cozy time?

http://replygif.net/i/385.gif

Good good.

What's that?

This seem familiar to you GD?

https://i.giphy.com/media/sd6MXy73D00py/giphy.gif

Nah nah... it ain't that...

https://i.giphy.com/media/xT5LMvrLeKQXhYiA6I/giphy.gif

HEY QUICK! LOOK OVER THERE WITH MOE!!

#GOT YEAH, A-

https://m.popkey.co/10af89/67KyZ_f-maxage-0.gif

######... --cough--... I'm fine 

Now...

http://p.fod4.com/p/media/undefined/YbMlwQMARQegpWQpSefj_Tiny%20Table%20Flip.gif

**_AH HA-_**

...

######FFS again?

Lemme try that again.

http://38.media.tumblr.com/9fbcf9e363c699821566219dbf35f7a2/tumblr_ngex96wRWh1qlaxh8o1_400.gif

#**_AH HA!!_ YOU THOUGHT THIS WAS A COZY HOW WAS YOUR DAY THREAD EH?!**

http://img11.deviantart.net/ccba/i/2011/279/e/0/gintoki_evil_smile_by_islam18-d4c0nbd.png

**WELL IT WASN'T!**

https://i.giphy.com/media/azTHVJSPZY3mg/giphy.gif

######Sorry I lied to you, but this is important. Kinda.

I've beaten Keryu and her 3rd party Moderator goons, I've beaten Wuks and some of the Wardens he could scratch up, and I even beat GhostCrawler _totally_ not by default because he didn't see or ignored [my callout thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/31cRQT7k-this-thread-wont-be-edited-by-ghostcrawler) for him too

######Sniff... didn't hurt my feelings or anything ether... I'M BULLETPROOF I SWEAR!1!!

For in fact...

http://i.imgur.com/jnfUR2e.gif/img

THIS THREAD IS A BEFORE THIS GD GOES BYE BYE AND WE MOVE TO ANOTHER ONE RIOTER (aka you) CALL OUT CHALLENGE THREAD!

http://static.tumblr.com/d4fac57e6e8faa6c932ec88e98444bad/dmsyo14/e5nn8s01o/tumblr_static_96k18yokfo4cswc4s0c8k040w.gif

THAT'S RIGHT! **YOU HEARD ME!**

http://www.gifbin.com/bin/052011/1306319335_angry_panda_vs_chef.gif

I'M CALLING YOU AND WHATEVER FELLOW RIOTER GOONS (that isn't Keryu) LIKE... uh... what rioters post here?... KATEYKHAOS!... and... uh... ... erm... Morg... uh... Morgageddon?... MORGAGEDDON!!... 

TO FIGHT ME AND SOME OF MY FRIEND GOONS OF GOON...NESS!... IN A CHALLENGE OF GD CUSTOM LEVELS OF DANKNESS!!

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/epicrapbattlesofhistory/images/3/32/Pikachu_come_at_me_bro.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150224014533

#_**BRING IT ON AT A DATE THAT IS THE MOST CONVENIENT FOR THE BOTH OF US AND OUR GOONS!1!!!**_

Before August 4th tho', cuz that's when this GD might be going bye bye.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
